channel.title: Pkp Adjusting and PRevention
channel.description:
Hey guys i was wondering how i could edit the PKP prices on my items inearly have looked every were in my soucrce to change a few items prices, i also have a pkp farming, i need a timer or something to prevent it ex, joe cant kill bob for another 5 pkp fpr 30+ mins,
Im using hybrid pvp 3 as a source, 317

item.title: Pkp Adjusting and PRevention
item.dc:creator: @Mushy13 Mushy13
item.description:
@Mushy13 wrote:

Alright thanks:) i had finally figured out like 5 mins before ya posted haha, but now i need help with pkp prevention

item.title: Pkp Adjusting and PRevention
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

[quote=“Mushy13, post:1, topic:424253”]Hey guys i was wondering how i could edit the PKP prices on my items inearly have looked every were in my soucrce to change a few items prices, i also have a pkp farming, i need a timer or something to prevent it ex, joe cant kill bob for another 5 pkp fpr 30+ mins,

Im using hybrid pvp 3 as a source, 317[/quote]
in shopassistant search specialitem

eventually youll come to

case ***:
return ***:

case is the item id and return is how much they cost,
to prevent pkp farming im not quite sure,

Read full topic
